servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to CAN Communication System Circuit Diagram:M16A and J20A Model .

servinfosub.title: Diagnosis Procedure

attention3.ptxt: Before executing items in this flow, be sure to perform CAN Communication System Check:M16A and J20A Model .

servinfosub.ptxt: When “Lost Communication” is detected in any control modules, perform inspection using the following procedure.

s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Connect SUZUKI scan tool to DLC (1) and ignition switch to ON.
Using “Communication Bus Check” under “Bus Check” of SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI-SDT), check for control module disabled to communicate (no display on screen).
Based on above check results, select applicable diagnosis flow code (A to K) from Diagnosis Flow Selection Table and perform troubleshooting according to selected diagnosis flow.

attention3.ptxt: If it is not possible to select suitable diagnosis flow code from “Diagnosis Flow Selection Table” Diagnosis Flow Selection Table or “two or more diagnosis flow codes are selectable”, perform Troubleshooting for Communication Bus Off:M16A and J20A Model .
Diagnosis flow codes A to J link with CAN communication lines [a] to [j] of CAN Communication System Circuit Diagram:M16A and J20A Model .

entry.ptxt: ECM and ABS / ESP® control module
All control module communicating by means of CAN

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from ECM and ABS / ESP® control module.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at ECM and ABS / ESP® control module connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between ECM connector and ABS / ESP® control module connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of ECM

test1.ptxt: Check ECM power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Connect connector to ECM.
Check CAN terminating resistance in ECM as follows.

item.ptxt: Measure Resistance between “E53-43” and “E53-44” terminal of ESP® control module connector.
Measure Resistance between “E03-10” and “E03-8” terminal of ABS control module connector.

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ABS / ESP® control module and recheck.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from BCM and ABS / ESP® control module.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at BCM and ABS / ESP® control module connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between BCM connector and ABS / ESP® control module connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ABS / ESP® control module and recheck.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from BCM and combination meter.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at BCM and combination meter connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between BCM connector and combination meter connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of combination meter

test1.ptxt: Check combination meter power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good combination meter and recheck.

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of steering angle sensor

test1.ptxt: Check steering angle sensor power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from steering angle sensor and ESP® control module.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at steering angle sensor and ESP® control module connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between steering angle sensor connector and ESP® control module connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: Check keyless start control module power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from keyless start control module and BCM.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at keyless start control module and BCM connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between keyless start control module connector and BCM connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good keyless start control module and recheck.

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of 4WD control module

test1.ptxt: Check 4WD control module power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from 4WD control module and ABS / ESP® control module.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at 4WD control module and ABS / ESP® control module connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between 4WD control module connector and ABS / ESP® control module connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good 4WD control module and recheck.

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of BCM

test1.ptxt: Check BCM power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from BCM and ABS / ESP® control module.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at BCM and ABS / ESP® control module connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between BCM connector and ABS / ESP® control module connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good BCM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of TCM

test1.ptxt: Check TCM power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from TCM and BCM.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at TCM and BCM.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between TCM connector and BCM connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of HVAC control module

test1.ptxt: Check HVAC control module power and ground circuits.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connector from HVAC control module and BCM.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at HVAC control module and BCM connectors.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between HVAC control module connector and BCM connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good HVAC control module and recheck.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect “G31” connector from BCM.
Check for proper terminal connection to CAN communication circuit at BCM connector.
If OK, check CAN communication circuits between DLC and BCM connector for breaking.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: Combination meter CAN terminating resistance check

test1.ptxt: Connect “G31” connector to BCM.
Disconnect connector from ABS / ESP® control module.
Measure resistance between CAN High terminal and CAN Low terminal on DLC.

testgroup.question: Is resistance 114 – 134 Ω?

action.ptxt: Go to Troubleshooting for Communication Bus Off:M16A and J20A Model .
Substitute a known-good BCM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Power and ground circuit check of control module that fails to communicate

test1.ptxt: Check power and ground circuits of control module that fails to communicate (BCM or ABS / ESP® control module).

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good control module (BCM or ABS / ESP® control module) and recheck.
